title: AceTheOnlyOne
author: AceTheOnlyOne
content: I have been working on and researching the protocols that different Cryptocurrencies use. I have found 12 different ones . Does anyone have a list of each time of consensus mechanisms used and protocols. Here are the ones I got so far. Proof of workProof of stakeDelegated proof of stakeProof of capacityProof of elapsed time     JlProof of identity Proof of authority    Proof of activityProof of connectivity Proof of movement    Proof of knowledge proof of succinctnessProof of location Proof of liquidity Is there any others that are used? I am working on a project that will incorporate as many consensus mechanisms possible. I am wondering if theres More protocols that can be developed?  The project is designed to bring together a community of innovation, evolution, and collaboration. This project will have a healthy sustainable tokenomics environment for lasting growth. Will allowed users an assortment of Versatility to earn assets and created Customization to each individual user. I would extremely appreciate somebody knowledgeable and is able to give reputable information.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: AceTheOnlyOne on May 11, 2022, 04:35:12 PMI am working on a project that will incorporate as many consensus mechanisms possible. Does this even make sense?Protocolos are security mechanisms, which have pros and cons. Some are based in centralization  (like proof of authority which have a limit number of validators), while others are more decentralized. Mixing security protocol is not like mixing words. Some of them do not work together

comments.author: AceTheOnlyOne
comments.body: That makes sense you can’t make some protocols I’m trying to speak to somebody that I can run shit by and see what protocols work well together and which ones do not
